channel.title: About the News/Events category
channel.description: Meetups, workshops, presentations, all sort of events. It's perfectly fine for users to announce and discuss their own events, as long as it is related to Axoloti somehow. Start your topic title with the name of the area where your event will happen.

item.title: About the News/Events category
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Meetups, workshops, presentations, all sort of events.
It's perfectly fine for users to announce and discuss their own events, as long as it is related to Axoloti somehow.
Start your topic title with the name of the area where your event will happen.

Read full topic
